author: bayard
msg: Updating ESCAPE_JAVA to use the new .with() approach and to fold the two unicode escape methods into one.

author: bayard
msg: Rather than writing specific translators to handle unicode between different ranges, UnicodeEscaper now supports a range filter. cf LANG-505

author: bayard
msg: Adding a method to chain translators together. I've gone back and forth on the name, currently with() is my preference. So you could say:  BASIC_XML.with(HTML4_ENTITIES). cf LANG-505

author: hansbak
msg: in request to project assignment use data from last request as default

author: crossley
msg: Re-generate to pick up rename Ki (JSecurity) to Shiro.
